titles.title: A joint resolution to establish a national policy for the taking of predatory or scavenging mammals and birds on public lands, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Prohibits the taking of predators or scavengers naturally occurring on public lands: (1) without the written approval of the applicable Secretary; (2) only after an opportunity for public comment; and (3) only if such taking will maintain the species at a level consistent with its role in the ecosystem and is in the public interest. Authorizes appropriations.
